    Action subtype which encodes the generic type for JSON parsing
    DeleteFromTextIndexJobService
    Service for managing jobs ids from the DeleteFromTextIndex API The destroy method should be called when the service is no longer needed.

    Holds the response from the DeleteFromTextIndex API

    Sample document for indexing documents into IDOL OnDemand.
    Document.Builder  
    Documents<T>
    Wrapper type for indexing JSON into IDOL OnDemand
